content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What Yammer is\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Yammer is EPAM's social network, where you can ask your questions in an informal setting and find useful information that will help you become a better professional. Feel free to post your questions and get answers from EPAM technology experts or management. Meet people from all EPAM locations, communicate and collaborate with them, share your ideas or even make friends like in other social networks. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/334182e7-f6da-40b9-bb42-78d8def13e16/Yammer%20task%20(pic1)%20(002).png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1271,\"height\":577}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NB: Yammer is a third-party solution by Microsoft\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Yammer is a good place for nowork discussions too. Here you can find communities on different hobbies and groups where you can sell/buy things, find an apartment for rent, connect with the administration on benefits and working conditions, and so on.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"But the best thing about Yammer is that this is a place where you can voice your opinion and be heard.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I'm new to Yammer. Do I have to register there? \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You do not have to register thanks to Single Sign On (SSO). When you open the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.yammer.com/epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Yammer homepage\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", just choose the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"log on\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" option. Your account will be created automatically. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Yammer language;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"do and religion are unwanted topics on EPAM Yammer. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reading Yammer\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When you join Yammer, you are automatically subscribed only to one group - \\\"All company\\\". If you don't join any other groups or follow any people, you'll only see updates from \\\"All company\\\" in your personal feed. If you want to get news from other groups, you'll have to join them. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NB: Yammer is currently undergoing redesign, so screenshots from the website and the titles may change\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/729387f5-6e26-4eee-bfa9-ec20e9e6a8c3/Yammer%20task%20(pic2)%20(002).png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":515,\"height\":210.99999999999997}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can find a catalog of recommended groups hosted on the Sharepoint Portal \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/Pages/Community.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"via this link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". It's a bit like an \\\"editor's choice\\\" list. Only active groups are included in the list. It also has categories for your convenience. A directory of all the communities can be found \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.yammer.com/epam.com/groups\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"in the appropriate section\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Posting on Yammer\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unlike most social networks, there are no personal walls on Yammer. So every time you post an update, you're posting to a group. This can be \\\"All company\\\" or any other public group (no need to be a member to post there) or private groups (you have to be a member to post there). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We recommend you use English in the All Company channel and in groups where colleagues from different locations discuss work-related issues. You can use other languages in groups intended for a local audience only.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Contacts and useful
